question_text: importance of democracy
response_categories: 1 not at all important / 10 absolutely important

question_text: a strong non-democratic leader that does not bother with parliament and elections
response_categories: 1 very good / 2 good / 3 bad / 4 very bad

question_text: Government leaders are like the head of a family; we should all follow their decisions.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: If we have political leaders who are morally upright, we can let them decide everything.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: When judges decide important cases, they should accept the view of the executive branch.
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: When the country is facing a difficult situation, it is ok for the government to disregard the law in order to deal with the situation
response_categories: 1 Strongly agree / 2 Somewhat agree / 3 Somewhat agree / 4 Strongly disagree

question_text: Which of these three statements is closest to your own opinion
response_categories: 1 Democracy is preferable to any form of government / 2 To people like me it doesn't matter what from of government / 3 In certain situations a non-democratic government can be preferable

response_categories: 1 Strongly disapprove / 2 Disapprove / 3 Neither approve nor disapprove / 4 Approve / 5 Strongly approve

question_text: only one political party is allowed to stand for election and hold office
response_categories: 1 Strongly disapprove / 2 Disapprove / 3 Neither approve nor disapprove / 4 Approve / 5 Strongly approve

question_text: elections and parliament are abolished so that the president can decide everything
response_categories: 1 Strongly disapprove / 2 Disapprove / 3 Neither approve nor disapprove / 4 Approve / 5 Strongly approve

to tell me which of the following sentences do you agree with the most?
